SYSTEM: 2022.11.PublicProcurementNLPChallenges.pdf: Página 25
Challenges in Public Procurement textual data
1.4. Budget preparation
25
Problem 4: Budget estimation
•
No tools to help building a budget.
•
What is the average price of X?
•
Many Awards just because the bid is the cheapest.
•
What is the relation between the tender budget and the
awarded bid budget?
1
The administration 
drafts the tender
Possible Solutions
•
Use text similarity to find average prices for similar objects.
Related to previous problems.
